Articles.Content: Just a small suggestion, I think the veteran Kerbals should have their signature orange suits on EVA, it’s slightly out of place to see them change into the ordinary default suit every time you hop out of your vessel.
hm... i support it. If i'm old enough i think in the past they had them, maybe before 1.4 or 1.3?
Not in 1.3, that's the version I play on and I've never seen it. I think 1.1? But it should be a thing.
I actually JUST noticed this last night and I agree
